Title: Glasner says patience paid off for Palace against Man City
Summary: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner says patience paid off against Man City . Eberechi Eze scored in the 16th-minute at Wembley before Dean Henderson made it 2-0 . Dean Henderson also made it 1-0 at Wembley with a second-half header .

Title: Guardiola urges Man City to use FA Cup pain to fuel top five bid
Summary: Pep Guardiola urges Man City to use FA Cup pain to fuel top five bid . Manchester City lost the FA Cup final to Manchester City in a shock defeat . Guardiola has urged his flops to use the pain from the final defeat as fuel to salvage their dismal season .

Title: LAWMA seals restaurant, arrests two suspects for illegal dumping of refuse
Summary: Lagos State Waste Management Agency (LAWMA) has taken into custody two suspects for illegal dumping of refuse along Durosimi-Etti Street in Lekki Phase 1 area of the state . This was disclosed in a statement by the Lagos state Commissioner .

Title: Top Nigerian banks make N165.27b from e-banking in Q1 2025 amid fintech competition
Summary: Eight leading Nigerian banks, including Zenith, Access, and UBA, recorded combined electronic banking income of N165.27 billion in the first quarter of 2025 . The banks maintained growth despite increasing competition from fintech firms .

Title: Ofili breaks 150m record as Nigerian athletes shine in Atlanta
Summary: Nigerian athletes made their mark at the 2025 Adidas Atlanta City Games on Saturday . Favour Ofili breaks 150m record as Nigerian athletes shine in Atlanta .

Title: Borno, FG review strategy to tackle resurgence of terrorist attacks
Summary: Governor Babagana Zulum of Borno says his administration is reviewing strategies to confront the recent resurgence of attacks in parts of the state . Zulum announced this on Saturday during a statewide broadcast, where he reaffirmed his commitment to strengthen local security architecture .

Title: Photos: Leo XIV’s inauguration mass begins in St Peter’s Square
Summary: Leo XIV's inauguration mass began in St Peter's Square on Sunday, attended by hundreds of dignitaries including US Vice President JD Vance and tens of thousands of faithful .

Title: ‘Tinubu transforming energy landscape’ – Lokpobiri flags off construction of Bauchi oil and gas academy
Summary: Honourable Minister of State for Petroleum Resources (Oil), Sen. Heineken Lokpobiri Ph.D, flagged off the construction of the permanent site for the Bauchi Oil and Gas Academy, Alkaleri (BOGAA) The move will contribute to Federal Government’s human capacity development in the energy

Title: NDLEA seizes cocaine hidden in Aso-Ebi caps, headgears
Summary: NDLEA seizes cocaine hidden in Aso-Ebi caps, headgears . The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency has uncovered a drug trafficking scheme involving cocaine hidden inside traditional Nigerian ceremonial wear .

Title: Wike’s position on power rotation, FCT reforms in Nigeria’s best interest – Okotie-Eboh
Summary: Prince Emma Okotie-Eboh described the FCT Minister Nyesom Wike as one of the finest politicians in Nigeria's Fourth Republic . The son of a former Minister of Finance and former Chairman of the APGA Campaign Council in last general election under APGA .

Title: EPL: Arteta blames injuries, red cards for Arsenal's title loss
Summary: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has attributed the club's failure to win the 2024/2025 Premier League title to a spate of injuries and costly red cards . Arsenal will host Newcastle at the Emirates in a must-win encounter to secure qualification for next season’s UEFA Champions League . The Gunners have suffered defeat to Newcastle three

Title: ‘We built this together,’ Davido pens touching message to manager
Summary: Afrobeats star Davido has penned an emotional tribute to his long-time manager, Asa Asika, following Asika’s traditional wedding in Lagos . He reflected on their enduring friendship, recalling the trials they have weathered together and the bond that has remained unbroken through success and hardship . Davido also praised

Title: Pope warns against exploitation in inaugural mass at Vatican
Summary: Pope Leo XIV is the first US head of the world's 1.4 billion Catholics . The 69-year-old made his debut mass in St Peter’s Square on Sunday . He called for the Church to be a transformational force in a world of division and hatred . US Vice President Vance was the last world leader to

Title: Police arrest wanted cattle rustler, kidnapper, recover arms in Nasarawa
Summary: This was disclosed in a statement released by the command’s spokesperson, Rahman Nansel, on Sunday . The criminal was captured following an intelligence-led operation by operatives of the State Criminal Investigation Department . Nansel was found with an AK-49 rifle and a magazine after being interrogated about his past illegal activities .

Title: VIDEO: NDLEA uncovers cocaine hidden in traditional 'aso-ebi' caps, headgears
Summary: National Drug Law Enforcement Agency uncovers cocaine hidden in traditional 'aso-ebi' caps, headgears . This was disclosed by the NDLEA spokesperson Femi Babafemi via his official X handle on Sunday . He warned Nigerians to exercise caution when asked to transport traditional wear abroad .
